Prod_notes: Includes natural and synthetic iron oxide pigments.

Type: Mine production, iron oxide pigments (ocher and red iron oxide)

Prod_notes: A significant number of other countries, including Austria, Azerbaijan, Brazil, China, Honduras, Iran, Kazakhstan, Lithuania, Paraguay, Russia, South Africa, Turkey, Ukraine, and the United Kingdom, may produce iron oxide pigments, but available information was inadequate to make reliable estimates of output.
